quotes.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: Life is living in the moment. The Present is a gift.
quotes.author: ML

quotes.text: Walk before you can run.
quotes.author: ML

quotes.text: Hello i am a test quote here to use a boat
quotes.author: funny bunny

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: It's not about ideas. It's about making ideas happen.
quotes.author: Scott Belsky

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.text: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
quotes.author: Martin Golding

quotes.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.text: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Yesterday's home runs don't win today's games.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
quotes.author: Robin Williams
